steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"818om","text":"Measure cell concentration using a hemocytometer. Ideally, the cell concentration should be around 1-2x10^5 cells/ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qhnf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
